Unept‚Äôs AMAZING MASTERPIECE.                             DoggyDonuts This game is amazing. With its shooting buzz saws, collapsing cliffs, and other shenanigans, this is my go-to game for when I‚Äôm bored, sad, or if I just need some trolling fun. The soundtrack is phenomenal, and the graphics are simple yet perfect. Definitely add more levels to the game! +*+*+*+Suggestions:+*+*+*+ -Add a hard level of the day that changes each time. -Maybe turn down the ads a little bit. I know you have to make money, but you could make people watch an ad to play the level of the day(see above). I am SO GLAD I stumbled upon this gem of a game hidden in a cave of boring rocks. Thank you, Unept!! Bye, DoggyDonuts
Perfect if you like to be surprised I had a great time playing through all the different levels and general chaos of simple level design.
egregious ads egregious, aggressive ads that just constantly harangue you after almost every level.
